::Fenox::

Fenox's eyes widened, misinterpreting D's words to mean that he knew 
that the Alliance base was underground. How would he know that 
though? Even if he had scanned, he would have only come up with a 
bunch of metal. But she had introduced this place as Alliance, so he 
might have deduced it from that. She follows D, having no idea that 
she had misunderstood him.

"Yeah, that's the Iron Fist," she says, walking alongside him. She 
wasn't used to such big beast modes. She notices his careful way of 
movement. "Don't worry, its not dangerous unless its told to be."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., tmrattrap@h... wrote:
> 
> Hotmail is whacked, I'll post from egroups until things straighten 
> out.
> 
> * D, still with a puzzled expression, glanced towards Fenox with 
> complete question as she reached out and touched his fur.
> In his life he had had the occasional pet from a passer by, so this 
> was nothing new to him.
> His ears lifted from his head and moved towards her, flicking here 
> and there to take in any other sounds. But there was something 
about 
> her that drew his attention, that just made him want to know more 
> about this strange place and her included. But all in good time.
> D shifted his weight from paw to paw, looking towards the Iron Fist 
> as Fenox pointed towards it.
> So that was called the Alliance Base? Interesting name.
> He focused back on the woman ahead of him, shifting again and 
feeling 
> his muscles move under his skin.*
> 
> " Alliance here..."
> 
> * He gestured towards ground.*
> 
> " Iron Fist there..."
> 
> * Then gestured towards the ship. In his mind, the Alliance was the 
> ground which the Iron Fist stood on. But he could be mistaken.
> D move out away from Fenox a bit, his head slightly lowered towards 
> the ground, his shoulders moving and expressing just what sort of 
> Prowl his creators had leashed inside of thos being.
> D may seem like he knew nothing but it turned out that he knew more 
> then anyone could know, but not of this world.
> He began to move off towards the Iron Fist, wanting a closer look 
at 
> it but not quite sure if it was safe.*
